attributes.action: Abolish the charging of VAT against the existing fuel taxation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ontop of any fuel tax levy already paid, purchasers must also pay 17.5% VAT on their total fuel purchase price. Except, most of the fuel purchase price already consists of TAX. So, all purchasers end up paying VAT for tax. By signing this petition, you show your grievence against paying tax for tax.
